pros: No pros, I would not recommend anyone to work here with Dave Armstrong as the President and his administration, as they are unethical and unjust.

pros: The university is very welcoming and going to work is enjoyable
cons: There are no cons to working at St thomas

review_title: Administration is Bullish, Unethical, Business Oriented
pros: Very few, if any, pros at this institution for students, staff, or faculty.
cons: No shared governance, extremely poor top-down leadership. Admin neglects teaching and research. Only focus is on increasing enrollment at all costs. As a result, student retention and graduation rates are abysmal. Zero checks and balances at the top: the President barks and all are expected to follow. No transparency or psychological safety for teachers. Student life is on the back burner. Employees either leave or are fired at concerning rates. The most frightening aspect of the university is the neglect of any sort of educational mission by the senior leadership and cabinet. The university is currently under sanction by the southern university accrediting body.
